conflict_categories.name: Ad Blockers
conflict_categories.description: Running multiple ad blockers can slow down your browser and cause websites to break.

conflict_categories.name: VPN Services
conflict_categories.description: Activating multiple VPN extensions simultaneously can lead to network conflicts or connection drops.

conflict_categories.name: Shopping Coupon Finders
conflict_categories.description: Multiple coupon extensions may override each other, preventing you from getting the best deal.

conflict_categories.name: Tab Managers
conflict_categories.description: Using several tab managers can lead to conflicts in organizing and suspending tabs.

conflict_categories.name: Proxy/Network Controllers
conflict_categories.description: Multiple extensions attempting to control network proxy settings can cause connectivity issues or instability.

conflict_categories.name: Screenshot/Screen Recorders
conflict_categories.description: Using more than one screenshot or screen recording tool may lead to hotkey conflicts or unexpected behavior.

conflict_categories.name: Password Managers
conflict_categories.description: Activating multiple password manager extensions can cause auto-fill conflicts, duplicate entries, or security vulnerabilities.

deprecated_extensions.name: The Great Suspender (Original)
deprecated_extensions.reason: This extension was removed from the store due to reports of malware.

deprecated_extensions.name: Honey
deprecated_extensions.reason: Reported as a potentially problematic or scam extension. Consider uninstalling for security.

alternatives.name: Browser's built-in coupon features (e.g., Chrome's Shopping)

deprecated_extensions.name: SaveFrom.net Helper
deprecated_extensions.reason: This extension has been associated with adware and unwanted software. It's recommended to use official download methods.

deprecated_extensions.name: Web of Trust (WOT)
deprecated_extensions.reason: Previously faced privacy concerns regarding user data collection. Newer versions might be improved, but caution is advised.

alternatives.name: Other reputable security extensions (e.g., Avast Online Security)
